Package businessLayer

Class Commands

java.lang.Object
businessLayer.Commands
public class Commands
extends Object
Author:
Leonties Dan Alexandru Class used to create the commands for updating or modifying the DB

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Commands()
    Simple constructor

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteClient​(AccessDB acc, String name, String city)
    Method used for deleting a client from the DB
    void deleteProd​(AccessDB acc, String prodName)
    Method used for deleting a product from the DB
    void editClientInfo​(AccessDB acc, String col, String info, String name)
    Method used to edit a client's information from the DB
    void editProd​(AccessDB acc, String prodName, int quantity, double price)
    Method used for modifying a product's quantity and price in the DB
    void generatePDFBill​(AccessDB acc, String Client, String prod, int quantity, double price)
    Method used for generating a Bill in a PDF format for a successful Order
    void generatePDFError​(AccessDB acc, String Client, String prod)
    Method used for creating the Under-Stock PDF with the error message that the client is asking for a quantity greater than the remaining stock

    Method used for inserting a new client in the DB
    void insertOrder​(AccessDB acc, String client, String prod, int quantity)
    Method used for inserting an Order in the DB (This method will be used in another method for inserting in the DB, this is just a simple insert)
    void insertProd​(AccessDB acc, String prod, int quantity, double price)
    Method used for inserting a new product in the DB, or if the product already exists the method for modifying an existing product is called
    void order​(AccessDB acc, String client, String prod, int quantity)
    Method used for inserting an Order in the DB, at the same time creating either a Bill in a successful order, or an Under-Stock PDF printing the corresponding message
    void reportClient​(AccessDB acc)
    Method used for creating the Report for all clients, with 5 columns : Id, Name, Address, Email and Age
    void reportOrder​(AccessDB acc)
    Method used for creating the Report for all orders, with 4 columns : Id, Orderer, Item and NbOfItems
    void reportProduct​(AccessDB acc)
    Method used for creating the Report for all products, with 4 columns : Id, Product, Quantity and Price

  • Method Details

    • insertClient

      public void insertClient​(AccessDB acc, String name, String location)
      Method used for inserting a new client in the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      name - Name of the client
      location - Address/Location of the client

    • deleteClient

      public void deleteClient​(AccessDB acc, String name, String city)
      Method used for deleting a client from the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      name - Name of the client
      city - Address/Location of the client

    • editClientInfo

      public void editClientInfo​(AccessDB acc, String col, String info, String name)
      Method used to edit a client's information from the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      col - The Column which needs to be modified
      info - The new information which needs to be updated
      name - Name of the client

    • insertProd

      public void insertProd​(AccessDB acc, String prod, int quantity, double price) throws SQLException
      Method used for inserting a new product in the DB, or if the product already exists the method for modifying an existing product is called
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      prod - Name of the product
      quantity - Quantity of the product
      price - Price of product
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the product that exists doesn't have a quantity value

    • editProd

      public void editProd​(AccessDB acc, String prodName, int quantity, double price)
      Method used for modifying a product's quantity and price in the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      prodName - Name of the product
      quantity - Quantity of the product
      price - Price of product

    • deleteProd

      public void deleteProd​(AccessDB acc, String prodName)
      Method used for deleting a product from the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      prodName - Name of the product

    • insertOrder

      public void insertOrder​(AccessDB acc, String client, String prod, int quantity)
      Method used for inserting an Order in the DB (This method will be used in another method for inserting in the DB, this is just a simple insert)
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      client - Name of the client
      prod - Name of the product
      quantity - Quantity which will be ordered

    • order

      public void order​(AccessDB acc, String client, String prod, int quantity) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
      Method used for inserting an Order in the DB, at the same time creating either a Bill in a successful order, or an Under-Stock PDF printing the corresponding message
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      client - Name of the client
      prod - Name of the product
      quantity - Quantity which will be ordered
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the Quantity and Price don't exist
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open

    • generatePDFBill

      public void generatePDFBill​(AccessDB acc, String Client, String prod, int quantity, double price)
      Method used for generating a Bill in a PDF format for a successful Order
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      client - Name of the client
      prod - Name of the product
      quantity - Quantity which will be ordered
      price - Price of the Order
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open

    • generatePDFError

      public void generatePDFError​(AccessDB acc, String Client, String prod) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
      Method used for creating the Under-Stock PDF with the error message that the client is asking for a quantity greater than the remaining stock
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      client - Name of the client
      prod - Name of the product
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open

    • reportClient

      public void reportClient​(AccessDB acc) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException, SQLException
      Method used for creating the Report for all clients, with 5 columns : Id, Name, Address, Email and Age
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open
      SQLException - If case the table can't be accessed

    • reportOrder

      public void reportOrder​(AccessDB acc) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException, SQLException
      Method used for creating the Report for all orders, with 4 columns : Id, Orderer, Item and NbOfItems
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open
      SQLException - If case the table can't be accessed

    • reportProduct

      public void reportProduct​(AccessDB acc) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException, SQLException
      Method used for creating the Report for all products, with 4 columns : Id, Product, Quantity and Price
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the File cannot be created, or the File is already open
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the Document cannot be created, or the Document is already open
      SQLException - If case the table can't be accessed
